comment:
>>46536681
You’ll have to see what it can do.

Tatsumaki applauds you, and there’s a few cheers from the bystanders. Looks like a crowd is beginning to form.

“That looks sweet! What’s it do?”

“If it’s worth using, you should take it to the duel arena at the Observatory.”

“Why don’t you go test it out on some Nameless?”

> Strife Memoriam, a Celestial artifact (worn, soulbound, 8/8 PP committed)

> Liza, Vyx, Tatsumaki, Ayla, and Sulya are online.
> Vision, Donnel, Nel, Smith, and Aelriss are offline.

> Escape to the tavern and message Ayla.
> Chill in the town square while you wait.
> Message someone else.
> Write-in.
